FeatureItem.Name: Data Binding
FeatureItem.Description: This section contains pages that allow you to bind the grid control to data, bind the current view's columns to data fields or create unbound columns.

FeatureItem.Name: Column, Rows, Cells Layout
FeatureItem.Description: The pages in this section allow you to customize the size, order and other layout aspects for columns, rows and cells.

FeatureItem.Name: Preview
FeatureItem.Description:
Availability: [{(OptionsView.ShowPreview=False)}OptionsView.ShowPreview] property.
Content: [PreviewFieldName] property, [CalcPreviewText] event.
Size: - [PreviewLineCount], [PreviewIndent], [{(OptionsView.AutoCalcPreviewLineCount=False)}OptionsView.AutoCalcPreviewLineCount] properties. - [MeasurePreviewHeight] event.

FeatureItem.Name: Sorting
FeatureItem.Description:
By default end users are allowed to perform sorting. The following main settings control its availability.
Availability: [{(OptionsCustomization.AllowSort=False)}OptionsCustomization.AllowSort], [{goto:Columns,OptionsColumn.AllowSort}Column.OptionsColumn.AllowSort] options.
Column headers' visibility: [{(OptionsView.ShowColumnHeaders=False)}OptionsView.ShowColumnHeaders] option.
Column header menu: [{(OptionsMenu.EnableColumnMenu=False)}OptionsMenu.EnableColumnMenu] option.
Sort order and behavior: [{goto:Columns,SortOrder}Column.SortOrder], [{goto:Columns,SortMode}Column.SortMode] properties.

FeatureItem.Name: Grouping
FeatureItem.Description:
You can group the view against a column DIRECTLY IN THE PREVIEW WINDOW (Your View tab). The main settings that control grouping are:
Grouping availability: [{(OptionsCustomization.AllowGroup=False)}OptionsCustomization.AllowGroup], [{goto:Columns,OptionsColumn.AllowGroup}Column.Options.AllowGroup] options.
The group panel's visibility: [{(OptionsView.ShowGroupPanel=False)}OptionsView.ShowGroupPanel] option.
Group row style: [OptionsView.GroupDrawMode] property.
Column group index and grouping style: [{goto:Columns,GroupIndex}Column.GroupIndex], [{goto:Columns,GroupInterval}Column.GroupInterval] properties.

FeatureItem.Name: Filtering
FeatureItem.Description:
MS Excel(r) style filtering: [{(OptionsCustomization.AllowFilter=False)}OptionsCustomization.AllowFilter], [{goto:Columns,OptionsFilter.AllowFilter}Column.OptionsFilter.AllowFilter] options.
Shape and behavior of filter buttons: [OptionsView.HeaderFilterButtonShowMode] property.
Auto filter row: [{(OptionsView.ShowAutoFilterRow=False)}OptionsView.ShowAutoFilterRow] [{goto:Columns,OptionsFilter.AllowAutoFilter}Column.OptionsFilter.AllowAutoFilter] options.
Filter panel: [OptionsView.ShowFilterPanelMode] option.

FeatureItem.Name: Summary
FeatureItem.Description: The pages in this section allow you to specify the total summaries which are displayed within the view footer, and the group summaries which are displayed for each group either within the group's rows or the group's footers.

FeatureItem.Name: Editing
FeatureItem.Description: The pages in this section allow you to specify settings for data editing.

FeatureItem.Name: Focus, Selection, Navigation
FeatureItem.Description: The pages in this section allow you to specify settings for focus, selection and navigation.

FeatureItem.Name: Master-Detail
FeatureItem.Description: The pages in this section allow you to customize how the view and its details work in master-detail mode.

FeatureItem.Name: Appearance
FeatureItem.Description: The pages in this section allow you to specify the look and feel (paint style) for the entire grid control or just for the currently selected view. They also enable you to change the style of individual view elements. For a list of all the visual elements available along with their appearance settings, refer to the [{gotoFeature:VE_Main}Visual Elements] section.

FeatureItem.Name: Visual Elements
FeatureItem.Description: This section contains pages that describe how to change the visibility, appearance and size of the visual elements provided by the grid control and the currently selected view.

FeatureItem.Name: Behavior
FeatureItem.Description: The pages in this section allow you to change how the view performs particular operations.

FeatureItem.Name: End-user Actions
FeatureItem.Description: The pages in this section provide settings that control the availability of particular actions to end users and events that provide notifications about actions performed.

FeatureItem.Name: Printing Settings
FeatureItem.Description:
This page provides access to all the settings available for customizing printing. You can also access the printing settings which relate to a particular visual element. See the [{gotoFeature:VE_Main}Visual Elements] section for this purpose.
Print styles enabled: [OptionsPrint.UsePrintStyles].

FeatureItem.Name: Column Layout
FeatureItem.Description:
You can set up the width and order of columns DIRECTLY IN THE PREVIEW WINDOW (Your View tab). Drag and resize column headers for this purpose.
Auto width: [{OptionsView.ColumnAutoWidth}OptionsView.ColumnAutoWidth] option.
Visibility: [{goto:Columns,Visible}Column.Visible] properties.
Width: [{goto:Columns,Width}Column.Width] property.

FeatureItem.Name: Fixed Columns
FeatureItem.Description:
The Fixed columns feature enables you to anchor columns to the left or right edges of views so that they are not affected by horizontal scrolling. The following main settings control the availability of fixed columns.
Column auto width: [{(OptionsView.ColumnAutoWidth=True)}OptionsView.ColumnAutoWidth] property should be disabled to allow horizontal scrolling.
Anchor position: [{goto:Columns,Fixed}Column.Fixed] property.
Separator: [Appearance.FixedLine], [FixedLineWidth] properties.

FeatureItem.Name: Rows
FeatureItem.Description:
The main settings that affect the layout of rows are:
Auto height: [{(OptionsView.RowAutoHeight=False)}OptionsView.RowAutoHeight] option. In effect when a memo or picture editor is assigned to a column's [{goto:Columns,ColumnEdit}ColumnEdit] property.
Height: [RowHeight], [GroupRowHeight] properties and [CalcRowHeight] event.
Row separator: [RowSeparatorHeight] property.
End-user resizing: [{(OptionsCustomization.AllowRowSizing=False)}OptionsCustomization.AllowRowSizing] option.

FeatureItem.Name: Cell Merging
FeatureItem.Description:
Cell merging is available when the [{gotoFeature:Feature_Preview}preview] and row separators are disabled. So the main settings that affect cell merging are:
Preview's visiblity: [{(OptionsView.ShowPreview=True)}OptionsView.ShowPreview] option.
Row separators: [RowSeparatorHeight] property should be 0.
Availability: [OptionsView.AllowCellMerge], [{goto:Columns,OptionsColumn.AllowMerge}Column.OptionsColumn.AllowMerge] properties.
Custom merging: [CellMerge] event.

FeatureItem.Name: Total Summary
FeatureItem.Description:
The main settings that control the availability of total summaries are:
Footer visibility: [{(OptionsView.ShowFooter=False)}OptionsView.ShowFooter] property.
Column summary: [{goto:Columns,SummaryItem}Column.SummaryItem] property.
Footer context menu: [{(OptionsMenu.EnableFooterMenu=False)}OptionsMenu.EnableFooterMenu] option.

FeatureItem.Name: Group Summary
FeatureItem.Description:
The main settings that affect the availability of group summaries are:
Group footers: [GroupFooterShowMode] property.
Group row content: [GroupFormat] property.
Summary settings: [{goto:Group Summary}group summaries collection].

FeatureItem.Name: In-place Editors
FeatureItem.Description:
Assign editors to: - columns: [{goto:Columns,ColumnEdit}Column.ColumnEdit] property. - cells: [CustomRowCellEdit] event.
Visibility of the Editor buttons: [ShowButtonMode], [{goto:Columns,ShowButtonMode}Column.ShowButtonMode] properties.

FeatureItem.Name: Scrolling
FeatureItem.Description:
Availability of Scrollbars: [HorzScrollVisibility], [VertScrollVisibility] properties.
Scrolling behavior: [ScrollStyle], [OptionsBehavior.SmartVertScrollBar], [HorzScrollStep] properties.
Vertical scrolling hint: [VertScrollTipFieldName] property (if [ScrollStyle] defines non-live vertical scrolling).
Scrolling notifications: [TopRowChanged], [LeftCoordChanged] properties.

FeatureItem.Name: Incremental Search
FeatureItem.Description:
The incremental search feature allows end users to locate rows by typing cell values when the view is not in edit mode.
Availability: [{(OptionsBehavior.AllowIncrementalSearch=False)}OptionsBehavior.AllowIncrementalSearch], [{goto:Columns,OptionsColumn.AllowIncrementalSearch}Column.OptionsColumn.AllowIncrementalSearch].

FeatureItem.Name: Focus
FeatureItem.Description:
End-user navigation settings: [OptionsNavigation] options.
Row or cell highlighted: [OptionsSelection.InvertSelection], [FocusRectStyle] option.
Focus change notifications: [FocusedRowChanged], [FocusedColumnChanged] events.
Column focus restriction: [{goto:Columns,OptionsColumn.AllowFocus}Column.OptionsColumn.AllowFocus] option.
Row focus restriction: [BeforeLeaveRow] event.

FeatureItem.Name: Row and Cell Selection
FeatureItem.Description:
Availability: [OptionsSelection.MultiSelect] option.
Row or cell selection: [OptionsSelection.MultiSelectMode] option.
Appearance: [Appearance.SelectedRow] property when the grid has focus, otherwise [Appearance.HideSelectionRow].
Selection change notification: [SelectionChanged] event.
Selecting via [{gotoFeature:VE_Indicator}indicator]: [OptionsSelection.UseIndicatorForSelection] option.

FeatureItem.Name: Detail View Settings
FeatureItem.Description:
If this view is a detail: Detail synchronization: [{(SynchronizeClones=False)}SynchronizeClones] property.
Size when expanded: [DetailHeight] property.

FeatureItem.Name: Master View Settings
FeatureItem.Description:
Detail availability: [{(OptionsDetail.EnableMasterViewMode=False)}OptionsDetail.EnableMasterViewMode] option.
Visual elements: [{(OptionsView.ShowDetailButtons=False)}OptionsView.ShowDetailButtons], [{(OptionsDetail.ShowDetailTabs=False)}OptionsDetail.ShowDetailTabs], [{(OptionsDetail.EnableDetailToolTip=False)}OptionsDetail.EnableDetailToolTip] options.
View zooming: [{(OptionsDetail.AllowZoomDetail=False)}OptionsDetail.AllowZoomDetail] option.
Detail view indent: [LevelIndent] property.

FeatureItem.Name: Create Master-Detail via Events
FeatureItem.Description:
Specify child relationships: [MasterRowGetRelationCount], [MasterRowGetRelationName], [MasterRowGetRelationDisplayCaption] events.
Supply detail content: [MasterRowEmpty], [MasterRowGetChildList] events.
Specify detail representation's kind: [MasterRowGetLevelDefaultView] event.

FeatureItem.Name: View Appearance
FeatureItem.Description: This page provides access to all the settings available for customizing the appearance of this view. You can also access the appearance settings related to a particular visual element. See the [{gotoFeature:VE_Main}Visual Elements] section for this purpose.

FeatureItem.Name: Auto Filter Row
FeatureItem.Description:
Auto Filter Row is one of the visual elements that allow end-user data filtering. When enabled, end users can enter values into this row's cells and the view will filter the data to display only the matched values.
Visibility: [{(OptionsView.ShowAutoFilterRow=False)}OptionsView.ShowAutoFilterRow] option.
Appearance: [Appearance.Row] property (specifies a common style for all data rows).
Manual painting: [CustomDrawCell] event (can be used to specify the Auto Filter Row's style without affecting other data rows).
Related Features: [{gotoFeature:Feature_Filtering}filtering].

FeatureItem.Name: Cells
FeatureItem.Description:
The cell layout is specified by the layout of rows and columns. The following appearance customization mechanisms for individual cells are available.
Appearance: [RowCellStyle], [RowCellDefaultAlignment], [{goto:Columns,AppearanceCell}Column.AppearanceCell] property, [{goto:Format Condition}format conditions].

FeatureItem.Name: Column
FeatureItem.Description:
The main features that control the order, size and appearance of columns are:
Visibility and order: [{goto:Columns,Visible}Column.Visible], [{goto:Columns,VisibleIndex}Column.VisibleIndex].
Size: [{goto:Columns,Width}Column.Width], [{goto:Columns,MinWidth}Column.MinWidth], [{goto:Columns,OptionsColumn.FixedWidth}Column.OptionsColumn.FixedWidth] properties.
Appearance for cells: [{goto:Columns,AppearanceCell}AppearanceCell] property.
Formatting of cells' texts: [{goto:Columns,DisplayFormat}Column.DisplayFormat] property.
Related features: [{gotoFeature:VE_Cells}cells], [{gotoFeature:VE_ColumnHeaders}column headers], [{gotoFeature:Layout_Columns}column layout].

FeatureItem.Name: Column Headers
FeatureItem.Description:
Column headers provide information about the contents of columns and allow numerous end-user operations such as column reordering, resizing, sorting, grouping, etc.
Visibility: [{(OptionsView.ShowColumnHeaders=False)}OptionsView.ShowColumnHeaders] option.
Appearance: [{Appearance.HeaderPanel}Appearance.HeaderPanel], [{goto:Columns,AppearanceHeader}Column.AppearanceHeader] properties.
Size: [{ColumnPanelRowHeight}ColumnPanelRowHeight] property.
Content: [{goto:Columns,Caption}Column.Caption], [{Images}Images], [{goto:Columns,ImageIndex}Column.ImageIndex], [{goto:Columns,ImageAlignment}Column.ImageAlignment] properties.
Hints: [{(OptionsHint.ShowColumnHeaderHints=False)}OptionsHint.ShowColumnHeaderHints], [{goto:Columns,ToolTip}Column.ToolTip] properties.
Manual painting: [{CustomDrawColumnHeader}CustomDrawColumnHeader] event.
Related Features: [{gotoFeature:Layout_Columns}Column Layout], [{gotoFeature:VE_ContextMenus}Context Menus].

FeatureItem.Name: Context Menus
FeatureItem.Description:
The grid view's built-in context menus can be invoked in [{gotoFeature:VE_GroupPanel}group panel], [{gotoFeature:VE_ColumnHeaders}column headers], [{gotoFeature:VE_Footer},footer] and [{gotoFeature:VE_GroupFooters}group footers]. They allow end users to customize the layout of groups, manipulate columns and specify summaries, respectively.
Availability: [{(OptionsMenu.EnableGroupPanelMenu=False)}OptionsMenu.EnableGroupPanelMenu], [{(OptionsMenu.EnableColumnMenu=False)}OptionsMenu.EnableColumnMenu], [{(OptionsMenu.EnableFooterMenu=False)}OptionsMenu.EnableFooterMenu] options in [{(OptionsMenu is null)}OptionsMenu].
Custom content: [ShowGridMenu] event enables you to customize context menus before they are displayed.
Custom behavior: [GridMenuItemClick] event lets you process item clicks in a custom manner.

FeatureItem.Name: Customization Form
FeatureItem.Description:
Availability via context menu: [{(OptionsMenu.EnableColumnMenu=False)}OptionsMenu.EnableColumnMenu] option.
Content (hidden columns): [{goto:Columns,Visible}Column.Visible], [{goto:Columns,OptionsColumn.ShowInCustomizationForm}Column.OptionsColumn.ShowInCustomizationForm] properties.
Column caption when in customization form: [{goto:Columns,CustomizationCaption}Column.CustomizationCaption] property.
Before customization form is displayed: [ShowCustomizationForm] event.
Hide notification: [HideCustomizationForm].

FeatureItem.Name: Detail Expand Buttons
FeatureItem.Description:
Availability: [{(OptionsDetail.EnableMasterViewMode=False)}OptionsDetail.EnableMasterViewMode] option (if there are details).
Visiblity: [{(OptionsView.ShowDetailButtons=False)}OptionsView.ShowDetailButtons] option.
Appears enabled or disabled depending on: [{(OptionsDetail.SmartDetailExpandButton=False)}OptionsDetail.SmartDetailExpandButtonMode] option.

FeatureItem.Name: Detail Tabs
FeatureItem.Description:
Availability: [{(OptionsDetail.EnableMasterViewMode=False)}OptionsDetail.EnableMasterViewMode] option (if there are multiple details).
Visiblity: [{(OptionsDetail.ShowDetailTabs=False)}OptionsDetail.ShowDetailTabs] option.
Position: [DetailTabHeaderLocation] property.

FeatureItem.Name: Detail Tooltip
FeatureItem.Description:
Availability: [{(OptionsDetail.EnableMasterViewMode=False)}OptionsDetail.EnableMasterViewMode] option (if there are multiple details).
Visibility: [{(OptionsDetail.EnableDetailToolTip=False)}OptionsDetail.EnableDetailToolTip] option.
Appearance: [Appearance.DetailTip] property.

FeatureItem.Name: Filter Buttons
FeatureItem.Description:
Filter buttons are displayed within [{gotoFeature:VE_ColumnHeaders}column headers]. They invoke filter dropdowns that are used to apply filtering in MS Excel(r) style.
Visibility: [{(OptionsCustomization.AllowFilter=False)}OptionsCustomization.AllowFilter], [{goto:Columns,OptionsFilter.AllowAutoFilter}Column.OptionsFilter.AllowAutoFilter] options.
Shape and behavior: [OptionsView.HeaderFilterButtonShowMode] property.
Appearance: [Appearance.ColumnFilterButton], [Appearance.ColumnFilterButtonActive] properties.
Manual painting: [CustomDrawColumnHeader] event.

FeatureItem.Name: Focus
FeatureItem.Description:
Row or cell highlighting: [OptionsSelection.InvertSelection], [FocusRectStyle] option.
Appearance availability: [{(OptionsSelection.EnableAppearanceFocusedRow=False)}OptionsSelection.EnableAppearanceFocusedRow], [{(OptionsSelection.EnableAppearanceFocusedCell=False)}OptionsSelection.EnableAppearanceFocusedCell] options.
Appearance: [Appearance.FocusedRow], [Appearance.FocusedCell] properties.
Appearance when grid is not focused: [Appearance.HideSelectionRow] property.

FeatureItem.Name: Footer
FeatureItem.Description:
The footer panel is designed to show [{gotoFeature:Feature_TotalSummary}total summary] values. End users can use the footer's [{gotoFeature:VE_ContextMenus}context menu] to change the total summary type for columns.
Visibility: [{(OptionsView.ShowFooter=False)}OptionsView.ShowFooter] option.
Appearance: [Appearance.FooterPanel] property.
Content: [{goto:Columns,SummaryItem}Column.SummaryItem] property. See [{gotoFeature:Feature_TotalSummary}total summary] for details.
Size: [FooterPanelHeight] property.
Manual Painting: [CustomDrawFooter] and [CustomDrawFooterCell] events.

FeatureItem.Name: Grid Lines
FeatureItem.Description:
Visibility: [{(OptionsView.ShowHorzLines=False)}OptionsView.ShowHorzLines], [{(OptionsView.ShowVertLines=False)}OptionsView.ShowVertLines] properties.
Row separator: [RowSeparatorHeight]
Appearance: [Appearance.HorzLine], [Appearance.VertLine] properties.
In printed grid: Appearance: [AppearancePrint.Lines].

FeatureItem.Name: Group Footers
FeatureItem.Description:
Group footers are designed to show [{gotoFeature:Feature_GroupSummary}group summary] values. End users can use the footers' [{gotoFeature:VE_ContextMenus}context menu] to change the summary type for columns.
Visibility: [GroupFooterShowMode] option.
Appearance: [Appearance.GroupFooter] property.
Content: [{goto:Group Summary}group summaries].
Manual Painting: [CustomDrawRowFooter] and [CustomDrawRowFooterCell] events.

FeatureItem.Name: Group Panel
FeatureItem.Description:
The Group Panel allows end-user grouping. Dragging a column header onto the Group Panel results in grouping the view against that column.
Visibility: [{(OptionsView.ShowGroupPanel=False)}OptionsView.ShowGroupPanel] option.
Content: [GroupPanelText] property.
Appearance: [Appearance.GroupPanel] property.
Manual painting: [CustomDrawGroupPanel] event.
Related Features: [{gotoFeature:Feature_Grouping}Grouping], [{gotoFeature:VE_ContextMenus}Context Menus].

FeatureItem.Name: Group Rows
FeatureItem.Description:
Group rows are used to organize data rows into a tree when data [{gotoFeature:Feature_Grouping}grouping] is applied. They display grouping values and [{gotoFeature:Feature_GroupSummary}group summaries] and allow end users to expand and collapse groups.
Appearance: [OptionsView.GroupDrawMode], [Appearance.GroupRow] properties. [GroupLevelStyle] event to specify level-dependent group row styles.
Content: [GroupFormat] property, [{goto:Columns,GroupFormat}Column.GroupFormat], [{gotoFeature:Feature_GroupSummary}group summaries].
Size: [GroupRowHeight] property, [CalcRowHeight] event.
Manual Painting: [CustomDrawGroupRow] event.

FeatureItem.Name: Hints
FeatureItem.Description:
Automatic cell and column header hints: [{(OptionsHint.ShowCellHints=False)}OptionsHint.ShowCellHints], [{(OptionsHint.ShowColumnHeaderHints=False)}OptionsHint.ShowColumnHeaderHints] options.
Custom hints for column headers: [{goto:Columns,ToolTip}Column.ToolTip] property.
Vertical scrolling tool tip: [VertScrollTipFieldName] property.

FeatureItem.Name: Indicator
FeatureItem.Description:
Visibility: [OptionsView.ShowIndicator] property.
Appearance: [Appearance.HeaderPanel] property.
Size: [IndicatorWidth] property.
Manual painting: [CustomDrawRowIndicator] event.

FeatureItem.Name: Joined Group Panel
FeatureItem.Description:
The [{gotoFeature:VE_GroupPanel}Group panel] can be turned into a Joined Group Panel to create a shared panel for the view and its details.
Avaiability: [{(OptionsView.ShowChildrenInGroupPanel=true)}OptionsView.ShowChildrenInGroupPanel], [ChildGridLevelName] properties.
Content: [ViewCaption] property to specify the text which represents the view in the joined group panel.

FeatureItem.Name: New Item Row
FeatureItem.Description:
New Item Row allows end users to add new records.
Visibility and position: [{(OptionsView.NewItemRowPosition=0)}OptionsView.NewItemRowPosition] property.
Content when inactive: [NewItemRowText] property.
Appearance: [Appearance.TopNewRow] if displayed at the top, otherwise the same as for [{gotoFeature:VE_Rows}data rows].
New row initialization: [InitNewRow] event.

FeatureItem.Name: Preview Section
FeatureItem.Description:
Visibility: [{(OptionsView.ShowPreview=False)}OptionsView.ShowPreview] property.
Indent: [PreviewIndent] property.
Appearance: [Appearance.Preview] property.
Manual Painting: [CustomDrawRowPreview] event.
Content and Size: see [{gotoFeature:Feature_Preview}preview feature].
When [{gotoFeature:Grid_Printing}printed]: Visibility: [OptionsPrint.PrintPreview] property. Appearance: [AppearancePrint.Preview] property.

FeatureItem.Name: Rows
FeatureItem.Description:
The main settings which affect the appearance and layout of data rows are:
Appearance: - any row:[Appearance.Row] property, [{goto:Appearance_StyleConditions}style conditions], [RowStyle] event. - even rows: [OptionsView.EnableAppearanceEvenRow], [Appearance.EvenRow]. - odd rows: [OptionsView.EnableAppearanceOddRow], [Appearance.OddRow].
Size: [RowHeight] property, [CalcRowHeight] event.
Auto size: [OptionsView.RowAutoHeight] option (in effect only when memo or picture [{goto:Columns,ColumnEdit}editors] are used).

FeatureItem.Name: Filter Dropdowns
FeatureItem.Description:
Filter dropdowns are shown when filter buttons are clicked. They allow end users to filter columns by the values in a particular column or specify a custom filtering condition.
Content: [OptionsFilter.ShowAllTableValuesInFilterPopup] and [OptionsFilter.ColumnFilterPopupMaxRecordsCount] properties, [ShowFilterPopupListBox] event.
Size: [OptionsFilter.ColumnFilterPopupRowCount] property.
MRU list: [OptionsFilter.AllowColumnMRUFilterList], [OptionsFilter.MRUColumnFilterListCount] options.
(Custom) item behavior: [OptionsFilter.UseNewCustomFilterDialog] property, [CustomFilterDialog] event.

FeatureItem.Name: Filter Panel
FeatureItem.Description:
The filter panel displays the currenly applied filter criteria, allows you to enable, disable or cancel the current filter and provides access to the most recently used filter conditions.
Provide an indication of when the view is filtered: [OptionsView.ShowFilterPanelMode] property.
Appearance: [Appearance.FilterPanel], [Appearance.FilterCloseButton] properties.
MRU filter conditions: [{(OptionsFilter.AllowMRUFilterList=False)}OptionsFilter.AllowMRUFilterList], [OptionsFilter.MRUFilterListCount], [OptionsFilter.MRUFilterListPopupCount] properties.
Printed appearance: [AppearancePrint.FilterPanel] property.
Manual painting: [CustomDrawFilterPanel] event.
Related features: [{gotoFeature:Feature_Filtering}filtering].

FeatureItem.Name: Column Layout
FeatureItem.Description:
Allow column moving: [{(OptionsCustomization.AllowColumnMoving=False)}OptionsCustomization.AllowColumnMoving], [{goto:Columns,OptionsColumn.AllowMove}Column.OptionsColumn.AllowMove] properties.
Allow column resizing: [{(OptionsCustomization.AllowColumnResizing=False)}OptionsCustomization.AllowColumnResizing], [{goto:Columns,OptionsColumn.AllowSize}Column.OptionsColumn.AllowSize] properties.
Width: [{goto:Columns,MinWidth}Column.MinWidth,] [{goto:Columns,OptionsColumn.FixedWidth}Column.OptionsColumn.FixedWidth] properties.
Best Fit feature: [BestFitMaxRowCount] property.
Column customization menu: [{(OptionsMenu.EnableColumnMenu=False)}OptionsMenu.EnableColumnMenu] option.
Column layout changes notifications: [{ColumnChanged}ColumnChanged], [ColumnWidthChanged] events.

FeatureItem.Name: Grouping
FeatureItem.Description:
Availability: [OptionsCustomization.AllowGroup], [{goto:Columns}Column.Options.AllowGroup] options.
Grouping Notifications: [StartGrouping], [EndGrouping] events.
Respond to and customize group row state changes: [GroupRowExpanding], [GroupRowExpanded], [GroupRowCollapsing], [GroupRowCollapsed] events.

FeatureItem.Name: Filtering
FeatureItem.Description:
MS Excel(r) style filtering availabilty: [{(OptionsCustomization.AllowFilter=False)}OptionsCustomization.AllowFilter], [{goto:Columns,OptionsFilter.AllowFilter}Column.OptionsFilter.AllowFilter] options.
Auto Filter Row availability: [{(OptionsView.ShowAutoFilterRow=False)}OptionsView.ShowAutoFilterRow], [{goto:Columns,OptionsFilter.AllowAutoFilter}Column.OptionsFilter.AllowAutoFilter] options.
Filter change notification: [ColumnFilterChanged] event.

FeatureItem.Name: Sorting
FeatureItem.Description:
Related visual elements: [{(OptionsView.ShowColumnHeaders=False)}OptionsView.ShowColumnHeaders], [{(OptionsMenu.EnableColumnMenu=False)}OptionsMenu.EnableColumnMenu] properties.
Sorting availability: [{(OptionsCustomization.AllowSort=False)}OptionsCustomization.AllowSort], [{goto:Columns,OptionsColumn.AllowSort}Column.OptionsColumn.AllowSort] options.
Sorting notifications: [StartSorting] and [EndSorting] events.

FeatureItem.Name: Scrolling
FeatureItem.Description:
Scrollbar availability: [HorzScrollVisibility], [VertScrollVisibility] properties.
Scrolling notifications: [TopRowChanged], [LeftCoordChanged] events.

FeatureItem.Name: Focus
FeatureItem.Description: Focus change notifications: [FocusedRowChanged], [FocusedColumnChanged] events.

FeatureItem.Name: Multiple Row Selection
FeatureItem.Description:
Availability: [OptionsSelection.MultiSelect] option.
Selection change notification: [SelectionChanged] event.
Selecting via [{gotoFeature:VE_Indicator}indicator]: [OptionsSelection.UseIndicatorForSelection] option.

FeatureItem.Name: Master-Detail
FeatureItem.Description: Expand / collapse notifications: [MasterRowCollapsed], [MasterRowExpanded] events.

FeatureItem.Name: Grouping
FeatureItem.Description:
Custom Group Intervals: [{goto:Columns}Column.GroupInterval] property, [CustomColumnGroup] event.
Grouping behavior: [{(OptionsBehavior.AutoExpandAllGroups=False)}OptionsBehavior.AutoExpandAllGroups], [{(OptionsBehavior.KeepGroupExpandedOnSorting=False)}OptionsBehavior.KeepGroupExpandedOnSorting] options.

FeatureItem.Name: Filtering
FeatureItem.Description:
Filter rows manually: [CustomRowFilter] event.
Filter dialog to use for columns: [OptionsFilter.UseNewCustomFilterDialog] property, [CustomFilterDialog] event.
Filter condition for [{gotoFeature:VE_AutoFilterRow}auto filter row]: [{goto:Columns,OptionsFilter.AutoFilterCondition}Column.OptionsFilter.AutoFilterCondition] option.
Filter update mode for [{gotoFeature:VE_AutoFilterRow}auto filter row]: [{goto:Columns,OptionsFilter.ImmediateUpdateAutoFilter}Column.OptionsFilter.ImmediateUpdateAutoFilter] option.

FeatureItem.Name: Summaries
FeatureItem.Description:
Suppress particular summaries: [CustomSummaryExists] event.
Custom functions: [{goto:Columns,SummaryItem.SummaryType}Column.SummaryItem.SummaryType], [{goto:Group Summary}SummaryItem.SummaryType] properties, [CustomSummaryCalculate] event.
Process summary changes: [GridMenuItemClick] event.
Total summary update mode: [OptionsBehavior.AutoUpdateTotalSummary] option.

FeatureItem.Name: Sorting
FeatureItem.Description:
Sort mode: [{goto:Columns,SortMode}Column.SortMode] property.
If "sort by display text" mode is enabled, the text can differ from the edit values if: A particular editor is assigned: [{goto:Columns,ColumnEdit}Column.ColumnEdit] property. Custom text is supplied manually: [CustomColumnDisplayText] event.
If custom sort mode is enabled: The sorting algorithm is supplied via the: [CustomColumnSort] event.

FeatureItem.Name: Scrolling
FeatureItem.Description:
Scrolling behavior: [ScrollStyle], [OptionsBehavior.SmartVertScrollBar], [HorzScrollStep] properties.
Vertical scrolling hint: [VertScrollTipFieldName] property.

FeatureItem.Name: Focus and Navigation
FeatureItem.Description:
Navigation settings: [OptionsNavigation] options.
Column focus restriction: [{goto:Columns,OptionsColumn.AllowFocus}Column.OptionsColumn.AllowFocus] option.
Row focus restrictions: [BeforeLeaveRow] event.

FeatureItem.Name: Master-Detail
FeatureItem.Description:
Expanding Behavior: [{(OptionsDetail.AllowOnlyOneMasterRowExpanded=False)}OptionsDetail.AllowOnlyOneMasterRowExpanded], [{(OptionsDetail.AllowExpandEmptyDetails=False)}OptionsDetail.AllowExpandEmptyDetails], [{(OptionsDetail.SmartDetailExpand=False)}OptionsDetail.SmartDetailExpand], [DefaultRelationIndex].
Custom expanding behavior: [MasterRowCollapsing], [MasterRowExpanding].
View zooming behavior: [{(OptionsDetail.AllowZoomDetail=False)}OptionsDetail.AllowZoomDetail], [{(OptionsDetail.AutoZoomDetail=False)}OptionsDetail.AutoZoomDetail].

FeatureItem.Name: Drag and Drop
FeatureItem.Description: Control internal drag and drop operations: - start: [DragObjectStart] event. - process: [DragObjectOver] event. - drop: [DragObjectDrop] event.
